svg.title: Recursive `xlink:href` (3)
svg.desc: Technically, the `rect` should be filled with a white to black gradient, so `xlink:href="#lg3"` should be ignored, because it references the initial gradient. But since recursion resolving is undefined, we can do whatever we want. `resvg` will remove `xlink:href="#lg2"`, because it's the first link that causes a recusion.
